divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside playing basketball when I saw a starlike object, I went to investigate and they invited me inside. They Had they same bodily shape as humans except they were only about 4-5 feet tall; they had skinny faces with large black eyes and they had no hair. The man that I talked to explained to me that they can speak ANY language as their occupants can. They brought me to the moon, the have me a special suit so I could explore and walk on Mars, and they also brought me to their planets, Zaldrax. They have a different time frame from Earth, 2 weeks on Earth is about 2 years on Zaldrax. After they showed me their planet they brought me back and left me unharmed.
Summary: I witnessed multiple UFO's and an abduction.
